title: Contract Software Engineer / Data Engineer
highlights: Contracted by PEI Group to support the acquisition of FundFilter
Integrated key FundFilter product features and data into PEI's existing infrastructure
Migrated the existing FundFilter data ingest pipeline into Databricks
I completed my work in May of 2024 and stepped away for some time off

title: Chief Technology Officer
highlights: Joined a small team early in the company's life cycle (1 year)
Worked closely with the founder to build a data-driven product that was acquired by PEI Group in 2022
Promoted to CTO and was responsible for all technical aspects of the company
Supported technical due diligence proceedings during the acquisition process

title: Senior Software Engineer
highlights: Built a stable, long lasting product that continues to produce revenue today with little maintenance
Implemented a Kubernetes backend that scaled to millions of page views (clients including Eminem, Celine Dion, Alyssa Milano, and Yes Theory)

title: Chief Technology Officer
highlights: Onboarded as a minority partner a few months into product development
Built companion web application to the company's flagship mobile app
Took over the company in late 2016 and led the company through a series of pivots
Ultimately failed to find a market fit for the product and folded the company in late 2018

title: Senior Software Developer
highlights: Joined Yardly a few weeks after its inception to build and lead a new software development team.
Designed and built Yardly's Uber-like software platform: a suite of iOS, Android, and web applications.
Worked closely with the company founders to guide and shape the brand, business model, culture, and direction of the company.
